resources.string: Harry, Hermoine, Ron sitting in a room at Hogwarts.
Question 1:\nWhat organization did Hermione start in her 4th year?
Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare
Question 2:\nWhat is Lord Voldemort\'s real name
Question 3:\nWhat\’s the LAST line of the book, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer\’s Stone?
“Harry, Ron, and Hermione looked at each other sheepishly and smiled.”
“I\’m going to have a lot of fun with Dudley this summer…”
“’Until the fall,’ said Dumbledore with a nod.”
Question 4:\nAccording to the Dursleys, how did Harry\’s parents die?
